<Link id="l01190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1190"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Registers for calling conventions, ordered in reverse as required by ABI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1191"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Both arrays must be of the same length.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1192" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af5d6511adaec426938bb02c1293d811e"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aad72cfbb210808985a9dc19f4e5d8542">MCPhysReg</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af5d6511adaec426938bb02c1293d811e">RegList8AVR</a>&#91;&#93; = &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1193"><span class="doxyHighlight">    AVR::R25, AVR::R24, AVR::R23, AVR::R22, AVR::R21, AVR::R20,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1194"><span class="doxyHighlight">    AVR::R19, AVR::R18, AVR::R17, AVR::R16, AVR::R15, AVR::R14,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1195"><span class="doxyHighlight">    AVR::R13, AVR::R12, AVR::R11, AVR::R10, AVR::R9,  AVR::R8&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1196" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a64f933f8ece040a6f23728fc4d8781fb"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aad72cfbb210808985a9dc19f4e5d8542">MCPhysReg</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a64f933f8ece040a6f23728fc4d8781fb">RegList8Tiny</a>&#91;&#93; = &#123;AVR::R25, AVR::R24, AVR::R23,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1197"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                         AVR::R22, AVR::R21, AVR::R20&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1198" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9acaeb675b10aa0f0638629fb9a5c7f2"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aad72cfbb210808985a9dc19f4e5d8542">MCPhysReg</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9acaeb675b10aa0f0638629fb9a5c7f2">RegList16AVR</a>&#91;&#93; = &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1199"><span class="doxyHighlight">    AVR::R26R25, AVR::R25R24, AVR::R24R23, AVR::R23R22, AVR::R22R21,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1200"><span class="doxyHighlight">    AVR::R21R20, AVR::R20R19, AVR::R19R18, AVR::R18R17, AVR::R17R16,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1201"><span class="doxyHighlight">    AVR::R16R15, AVR::R15R14, AVR::R14R13, AVR::R13R12, AVR::R12R11,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1202"><span class="doxyHighlight">    AVR::R11R10, AVR::R10R9,  AVR::R9R8&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1203" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5b45425dfb6f9d37f9f57facaabc1b7b"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aad72cfbb210808985a9dc19f4e5d8542">MCPhysReg</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5b45425dfb6f9d37f9f57facaabc1b7b">RegList16Tiny</a>&#91;&#93; = &#123;AVR::R26R25, AVR::R25R24,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1204"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                          AVR::R24R23, AVR::R23R22,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1205"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                          AVR::R22R21, AVR::R21R20&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1206"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1207"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;assert</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(std::size(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af5d6511adaec426938bb02c1293d811e">RegList8AVR</a>) == std::size(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9acaeb675b10aa0f0638629fb9a5c7f2">RegList16AVR</a>),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1208"><span class="doxyHighlight">              </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;8-bit and 16-bit register arrays must be of equal length&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1209"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;assert</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(std::size(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a64f933f8ece040a6f23728fc4d8781fb">RegList8Tiny</a>) == std::size(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5b45425dfb6f9d37f9f57facaabc1b7b">RegList16Tiny</a>),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1210"><span class="doxyHighlight">              </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;8-bit and 16-bit register arrays must be of equal length&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1211"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1212"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Analyze incoming and outgoing function arguments. We need custom C++ code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1213"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// to handle special constraints in the ABI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1214"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// In addition, all pieces of a certain argument have to be passed either</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1215"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// using registers or the stack but never mixing both.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1216"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ArgT&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1217" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8423e53bcc9782e23a4e48e8ef88d150"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8423e53bcc9782e23a4e48e8ef88d150">analyzeArguments</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/targetlowering/callloweringinfo">TargetLowering::CallLoweringInfo</a> &#42;CLI,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1218"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout">DataLayout</a> &#42;TD,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1219"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;ArgT&gt;</a> &amp;Args,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1220"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;CCValAssign&gt;</a> &amp;ArgLocs,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1221"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccstate">CCState</a> &amp;CCInfo, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Tiny) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1222"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Choose the proper register list for argument passing according to the ABI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1223"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;MCPhysReg&gt;</a> RegList8;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1224"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;MCPhysReg&gt;</a> RegList16;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1225"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Tiny) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1226"><span class="doxyHighlight">    RegList8 = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab9c6b351507d3c0730f4290919d43a12">ArrayRef</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a64f933f8ece040a6f23728fc4d8781fb">RegList8Tiny</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1227"><span class="doxyHighlight">    RegList16 = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab9c6b351507d3c0730f4290919d43a12">ArrayRef</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5b45425dfb6f9d37f9f57facaabc1b7b">RegList16Tiny</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1228"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1229"><span class="doxyHighlight">    RegList8 = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab9c6b351507d3c0730f4290919d43a12">ArrayRef</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af5d6511adaec426938bb02c1293d811e">RegList8AVR</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1230"><span class="doxyHighlight">    RegList16 = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab9c6b351507d3c0730f4290919d43a12">ArrayRef</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9acaeb675b10aa0f0638629fb9a5c7f2">RegList16AVR</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1231"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1232"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1233"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumArgs = Args.size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1234"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is the index of the last used register, in RegList&#42;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1235"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// -1 means R26 (R26 is never actually used in CC).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1236"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RegLastIdx = -1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1237"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Once a value is passed to the stack it will always be used</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1238"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UseStack = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1239"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i != NumArgs;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1240"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt">MVT</a> VT = Args&#91;i&#93;.VT;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1241"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We have to count the number of bytes for each function argument, that is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1242"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// those Args with the same OrigArgIndex. This is important in case the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1243"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// function takes an aggregate type.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1244"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Current argument will be between &#91;i..j).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1245"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ArgIndex = Args&#91;i&#93;.OrigArgIndex;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1246"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TotalBytes = VT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt/#ab8e1af73424a59a00656c9ffd505c03f">getStoreSize</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1247"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> j = i + 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1248"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (; j != NumArgs; ++j) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1249"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Args&#91;j&#93;.OrigArgIndex != ArgIndex)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1250"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1251"><span class="doxyHighlight">      TotalBytes += Args&#91;j&#93;.VT.getStoreSize();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1252"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1253"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Round up to even number of bytes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1254"><span class="doxyHighlight">    TotalBytes = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(TotalBytes, 2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1255"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Skip zero sized arguments</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1256"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (TotalBytes == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1257"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1258"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The index of the first register to be used</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1259"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RegIdx = RegLastIdx + TotalBytes;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1260"><span class="doxyHighlight">    RegLastIdx = RegIdx;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1261"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there are not enough registers, use the stack</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1262"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RegIdx &gt;= RegList8.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1263"><span class="doxyHighlight">      UseStack = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1264"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1265"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (; i != j; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1266"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt">MVT</a> VT = Args&#91;i&#93;.VT;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1267"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1268"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (UseStack) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1269"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> evt = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt">EVT</a>(VT).<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#ab0cfceeb37508e56f9c127e59766a668">getTypeForEVT</a>(CCInfo.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccstate/#a7df2f5c1123cf7727eaa5b91c0598adf">getContext</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1270"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = CCInfo.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccstate/#a808eee3ccda95974f0ac2b1c318ec336">AllocateStack</a>(TD-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout/#aa48b3b7e554b44f4e513d5dd8d9f9343">getTypeAllocSize</a>(evt),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1271"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                               TD-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout/#a800e74bec9b78d6739665027c3616a55">getABITypeAlign</a>(evt));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1272"><span class="doxyHighlight">        CCInfo.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccstate/#af04b635419bda8cbc4fe1f056b160f8d">addLoc</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1273"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccvalassign/#a36d9dd26dea75ebba5b55516b52e0752">CCValAssign::getMem</a>(i, VT, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>, VT, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccvalassign/#a2b78fd53da0b5df7bc4eacf7df556a45a8b73d77b9e54663c2e80a48d0917dce1">CCValAssign::Full</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1274"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1275"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1276"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (VT == MVT::i8) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1277"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a> = CCInfo.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccstate/#a676595eca705be482ea3e77b9e3ea2ec">AllocateReg</a>(RegList8&#91;RegIdx&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1278"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (VT == MVT::i16) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1279"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a> = CCInfo.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccstate/#a676595eca705be482ea3e77b9e3ea2ec">AllocateReg</a>(RegList16&#91;RegIdx&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1280"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1281"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1282"><span class="doxyHighlight">              </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;calling convention can only manage i8 and i16 types&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1283"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1284"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a> &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;register not available in calling convention&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1285"><span class="doxyHighlight">        CCInfo.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccstate/#af04b635419bda8cbc4fe1f056b160f8d">addLoc</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccvalassign/#a29708e79e029f1029d46d65e7631b778">CCValAssign::getReg</a>(i, VT, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>, VT, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccvalassign/#a2b78fd53da0b5df7bc4eacf7df556a45a8b73d77b9e54663c2e80a48d0917dce1">CCValAssign::Full</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1286"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Registers inside a particular argument are sorted in increasing order</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1287"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (remember the array is reversed).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1288"><span class="doxyHighlight">        RegIdx -= VT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt/#ab8e1af73424a59a00656c9ffd505c03f">getStoreSize</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1289"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1290"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1291"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1292"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1293"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1294"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Count the total number of bytes needed to pass or return these arguments.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1295"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ArgT&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1296"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1297" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aaf3a34e481e99124e251288ae497d041"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aaf3a34e481e99124e251288ae497d041">getTotalArgumentsSizeInBytes</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;ArgT&gt;</a> &amp;Args) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1298"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TotalBytes = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1299"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1300"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ArgT &amp;Arg : Args) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1301"><span class="doxyHighlight">    TotalBytes += Arg.VT.getStoreSize();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1305"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1306"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Analyze incoming and outgoing value of returning from a function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1307"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The algorithm is similar to analyzeArguments, but there can only be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1308"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// one value, possibly an aggregate, and it is limited to 8 bytes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1309"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ArgT&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1310" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a08acbbba5edd5a9d4090220358bc9305"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a08acbbba5edd5a9d4090220358bc9305">analyzeReturnValues</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;ArgT&gt;</a> &amp;Args,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1311"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccstate">CCState</a> &amp;CCInfo, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Tiny) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1312"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumArgs = Args.size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1313"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TotalBytes = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aaf3a34e481e99124e251288ae497d041">getTotalArgumentsSizeInBytes</a>(Args);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1314"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// CanLowerReturn() guarantees this assertion.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1315"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Tiny)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1333"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// GCC-ABI says that the size is rounded up to the next even number,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1339"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1343"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i != NumArgs; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1384"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Arguments stored on registers.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1398"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1399"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// :NOTE: Clang should not promote any i8 into i16 but for safety the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1400"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// following code will handle zexts or sexts generated by other</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1401"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// front ends. Otherwise:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1402"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this is an 8 bit value, it is really passed promoted</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1403"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to 16 bits. Insert an assert&#91;sz&#93;ext to capture this, then</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1404"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// truncate to the right size.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1405"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (VA.getLocInfo()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1513"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1514"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// First, walk the register assignments, inserting copies.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1515"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AI, AE;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1516"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HasStackArgs = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1517"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (AI = 0, AE = ArgLocs.size(); AI != AE; ++AI) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1518"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CCValAssign &amp;VA = ArgLocs&#91;AI&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1519"><span class="doxyHighlight">    EVT RegVT = VA.getLocVT();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1520"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64isellowering-cpp/#a51cb24bd3e700fcf2f93d1afbb555a16">SDValue</a> Arg = OutVals&#91;AI&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1521"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1522"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Promote the value if needed. With Clang this should not happen.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1554"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Second, stack arguments have to walked.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1555"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Previously this code created chained stores but those chained stores appear</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1556"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to be unchained in the legalization phase. Therefore, do not attempt to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1557"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// chain them here. In fact, chaining them here somehow causes the first and</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1882"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.eraseFromParent(); </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The pseudo instruction is gone now.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1883"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RemBB;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1884"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1885"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1886"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do a multibyte AVR shift. Insert shift instructions and put the output</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1887"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// registers in the Regs array.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1888"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Because AVR does not have a normal shift instruction (only a single bit shift</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1889"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction), we have to emulate this behavior with other instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1890"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// It first tries large steps (moving registers around) and then smaller steps</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1891"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// like single bit shifts.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1892"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Large shifts actually reduce the number of shifted registers, so the below</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1893"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// algorithms have to work independently of the number of registers that are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1894"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// shifted.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1895"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For more information and background, see this blogpost:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1896"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// https://aykevl.nl/2021/02/avr-bitshift</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1897" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad64501a368789645f6f80afbce82da90"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad64501a368789645f6f80afbce82da90">insertMultibyteShift</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;BB,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1898"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mutablearrayref">MutableArrayRef</a>&lt;std::pair&lt;Register, int&gt;&gt; Regs,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1899"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110">ISD::NodeType</a> Opc, int64&#95;t ShiftAmt) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1900"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetinstrinfo">TargetInstrInfo</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a> = &#42;BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#acf6442108e21e7e5379feb8962de65b7">getParent</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#a3825368aca2bc1550d173660df4da6a6">getSubtarget</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetsubtargetinfo/#acd858ed72f11db9444617740c3622608">getInstrInfo</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1901"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/avrsubtarget">AVRSubtarget</a> &amp;STI = BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#acf6442108e21e7e5379feb8962de65b7">getParent</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#a3825368aca2bc1550d173660df4da6a6">getSubtarget</a>&lt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/avrsubtarget">AVRSubtarget</a>&gt;();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1902"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineregisterinfo">MachineRegisterInfo</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a> = BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#acf6442108e21e7e5379feb8962de65b7">getParent</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#a810234b6b3d223b7c74a4253fcc5ea5e">getRegInfo</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01903" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1903"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugloc">DebugLoc</a> &amp;dl = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getDebugLoc();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01904" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1904"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1905"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ShiftLeft = Opc == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a8cc94e03dea594863073a02f5bb94997">ISD::SHL</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01906" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1906"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ArithmeticShift = Opc == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a4a055321c361a0f6ee77ed764730ffc1">ISD::SRA</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1907"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1908"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Zero a register, for use in later operations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1909"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> ZeroReg = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>.createVirtualRegister(&amp;AVR::GPR8RegClass);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1910"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a17e04afcf0c5efeb0eb6a9a45287b5e4">BuildMI</a>(&#42;BB, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, dl, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>.get(AVR::COPY), ZeroReg)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1912"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1913"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do a shift modulo 6 or 7 This is a bit more complicated than most shifts</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1914"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and is hard to compose with the rest, so these are special cased.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1915"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The basic idea is to shift one or two bits in the opposite direction and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1916"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// then move registers around to get the correct end result.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1917"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ShiftLeft &amp;&amp; (ShiftAmt % 8) &gt;= 6) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1918"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Left shift modulo 6 or 7</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1919"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1920"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Create a slice of the registers we&#39;re going to modify, to ease working</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1921"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with them.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1922"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ShiftRegsOffset = ShiftAmt / 8;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1923"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ShiftRegsSize = Regs.size() - ShiftRegsOffset;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1924"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mutablearrayref">MutableArrayRef&lt;std::pair&lt;Register, int&gt;</a>&gt; ShiftRegs =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1925"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Regs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mutablearrayref/#ae671f7b11f895cb673f6ee9a3c694359">slice</a>(ShiftRegsOffset, ShiftRegsSize);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1926"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1927"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Shift one to the right, keeping the least significant bit as the carry</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1928"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1929"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad64501a368789645f6f80afbce82da90">insertMultibyteShift</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, BB, ShiftRegs, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a3c6553c8acebe1b57c211ee45e2d8f98">ISD::SRL</a>, 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1930"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1931"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Rotate the least significant bit from the carry bit into a new register</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1932"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (that starts out zero).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1933"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> LowByte = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>.createVirtualRegister(&amp;AVR::GPR8RegClass);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1934"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a17e04afcf0c5efeb0eb6a9a45287b5e4">BuildMI</a>(&#42;BB, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, dl, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>.get(AVR::RORRd), LowByte).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#a927857fc69e4b4f0cde307f86f180df5">addReg</a>(ZeroReg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1935"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1936"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Shift one more to the right if this is a modulo-6 shift.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1937"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ShiftAmt % 8 == 6) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1938"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad64501a368789645f6f80afbce82da90">insertMultibyteShift</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, BB, ShiftRegs, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a3c6553c8acebe1b57c211ee45e2d8f98">ISD::SRL</a>, 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1939"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> NewLowByte = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>.createVirtualRegister(&amp;AVR::GPR8RegClass);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1940"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a17e04afcf0c5efeb0eb6a9a45287b5e4">BuildMI</a>(&#42;BB, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, dl, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>.get(AVR::RORRd), NewLowByte).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#a927857fc69e4b4f0cde307f86f180df5">addReg</a>(LowByte);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01941" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1941"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LowByte = NewLowByte;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01942" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1942"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01943" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1943"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01944" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1944"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Move all registers to the left, zeroing the bottom registers as needed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01945" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1945"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; Regs.size(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>++) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01946" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1946"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ShiftRegsIdx = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> + 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01947" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1947"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ShiftRegsIdx &lt; (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)ShiftRegs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01948" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1948"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Regs&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; = ShiftRegs&#91;ShiftRegsIdx&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01949" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1949"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ShiftRegsIdx == (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)ShiftRegs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01950" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1950"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Regs&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; = std::pair(LowByte, 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01951" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1951"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01952" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1952"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Regs&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; = std::pair(ZeroReg, 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01953" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1953"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01954" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1954"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01955" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1955"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01956" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1956"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01957" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1957"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01958" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1958"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01959" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1959"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Right shift modulo 6 or 7</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01960" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1960"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!ShiftLeft &amp;&amp; (ShiftAmt % 8) &gt;= 6) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01961" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1961"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Create a view on the registers we&#39;re going to modify, to ease working</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01962" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1962"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with them.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01963" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1963"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ShiftRegsSize = Regs.size() - (ShiftAmt / 8);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01964" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1964"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mutablearrayref">MutableArrayRef&lt;std::pair&lt;Register, int&gt;</a>&gt; ShiftRegs =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01965" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1965"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Regs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mutablearrayref/#ae671f7b11f895cb673f6ee9a3c694359">slice</a>(0, ShiftRegsSize);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01966" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1966"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01967" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1967"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Shift one to the left.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01968" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1968"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad64501a368789645f6f80afbce82da90">insertMultibyteShift</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, BB, ShiftRegs, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a8cc94e03dea594863073a02f5bb94997">ISD::SHL</a>, 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01969" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1969"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01970" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1970"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Sign or zero extend the most significant register into a new register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01971" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1971"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The HighByte is the byte that still has one (or two) bits from the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01972" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1972"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// original value. The ExtByte is purely a zero/sign extend byte (all bits</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01973" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1973"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are either 0 or 1).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01974" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1974"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> HighByte = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>.createVirtualRegister(&amp;AVR::GPR8RegClass);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01975" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1975"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> ExtByte = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01976" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1976"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ArithmeticShift) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01977" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1977"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Sign-extend bit that was shifted out last.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01978" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1978"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a17e04afcf0c5efeb0eb6a9a45287b5e4">BuildMI</a>(&#42;BB, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, dl, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>.get(AVR::SBCRdRr), HighByte)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01979" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1979"><span class="doxyHighlight">          .<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#a927857fc69e4b4f0cde307f86f180df5">addReg</a>(HighByte, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/regstate/#ade26fe5c9b3fe6948def36f7ca12dfc5ab502f975742e9bff6d6dd7b49439b806">RegState::Undef</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01980" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1980"><span class="doxyHighlight">          .<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#a927857fc69e4b4f0cde307f86f180df5">addReg</a>(HighByte, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/regstate/#ade26fe5c9b3fe6948def36f7ca12dfc5ab502f975742e9bff6d6dd7b49439b806">RegState::Undef</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01981" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1981"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ExtByte = HighByte;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01982" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1982"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The highest bit of the original value is the same as the zero-extend</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01983" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1983"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// byte, so HighByte and ExtByte are the same.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01984" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1984"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01985" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1985"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Use the zero register for zero extending.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01986" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1986"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ExtByte = ZeroReg;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01987" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1987"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Rotate most significant bit into a new register (that starts out zero).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01988" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1988"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a17e04afcf0c5efeb0eb6a9a45287b5e4">BuildMI</a>(&#42;BB, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, dl, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>.get(AVR::ADCRdRr), HighByte)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01991" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1991"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01992" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1992"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01993" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1993"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Shift one more to the left for modulo 6 shifts.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01994" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1994"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ShiftAmt % 8 == 6) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01995" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1995"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad64501a368789645f6f80afbce82da90">insertMultibyteShift</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, BB, ShiftRegs, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a8cc94e03dea594863073a02f5bb94997">ISD::SHL</a>, 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01996" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1996"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Shift the topmost bit into the HighByte.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01997" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1997"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> NewExt = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>.createVirtualRegister(&amp;AVR::GPR8RegClass);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01998" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1998"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a17e04afcf0c5efeb0eb6a9a45287b5e4">BuildMI</a>(&#42;BB, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, dl, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>.get(AVR::ADCRdRr), NewExt)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2001"><span class="doxyHighlight">      HighByte = NewExt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2002"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2003"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2004"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Move all to the right, while sign or zero extending.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2005"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = Regs.size() - 1; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &gt;= 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>--) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2006"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ShiftRegsIdx = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> - (Regs.size() - ShiftRegs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>()) - 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2007"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ShiftRegsIdx &gt;= 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2008"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Regs&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; = ShiftRegs&#91;ShiftRegsIdx&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2009"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ShiftRegsIdx == -1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2010"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Regs&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; = std::pair(HighByte, 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2011"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2012"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Regs&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; = std::pair(ExtByte, 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2013"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2014"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2015"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2016"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2017"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2018"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2019"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For shift amounts of at least one register, simply rename the registers and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2020"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// zero the bottom registers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2021"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ShiftLeft &amp;&amp; ShiftAmt &gt;= 8) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2022"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Move all registers one to the left.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2023"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; Regs.size() - 1; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>++) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2024"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Regs&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; = Regs&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> + 1&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2025"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2026"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2027"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Zero the least significant register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2028"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Regs&#91;Regs.size() - 1&#93; = std::pair(ZeroReg, 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2029"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2030"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Continue shifts with the leftover registers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2031"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Regs = Regs.drop&#95;back(1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2032"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2033"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ShiftAmt -= 8;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2034"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2035"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2036"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// And again, the same for right shifts.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2037"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> ShrExtendReg = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2038"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!ShiftLeft &amp;&amp; ShiftAmt &gt;= 8) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2039"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ArithmeticShift) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2040"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Sign extend the most significant register into ShrExtendReg.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2041"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ShrExtendReg = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>.createVirtualRegister(&amp;AVR::GPR8RegClass);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2042"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> Tmp = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>.createVirtualRegister(&amp;AVR::GPR8RegClass);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2043"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a17e04afcf0c5efeb0eb6a9a45287b5e4">BuildMI</a>(&#42;BB, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, dl, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>.get(AVR::ADDRdRr), Tmp)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2046"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a17e04afcf0c5efeb0eb6a9a45287b5e4">BuildMI</a>(&#42;BB, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, dl, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>.get(AVR::SBCRdRr), ShrExtendReg)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2047"><span class="doxyHighlight">          .<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#a927857fc69e4b4f0cde307f86f180df5">addReg</a>(Tmp)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2049"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2050"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ShrExtendReg = ZeroReg;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2051"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2052"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (; ShiftAmt &gt;= 8; ShiftAmt -= 8) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2053"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Move all registers one to the right.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2054"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = Regs.size() - 1; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>--) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2055"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Regs&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; = Regs&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> - 1&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2056"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2057"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2058"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Zero or sign extend the most significant register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2059"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Regs&#91;0&#93; = std::pair(ShrExtendReg, 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2060"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2061"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Continue shifts with the leftover registers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2062"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Regs = Regs.drop&#95;front(1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2063"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2064"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2065"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2066"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The bigger shifts are already handled above.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2067"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((ShiftAmt &lt; 8) &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Unexpect shift amount&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2068"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2069"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Shift by four bits, using a complicated swap/eor/andi/eor sequence.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2070"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// It only works for logical shifts because the bits shifted in are all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2071"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// zeroes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2072"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To shift a single byte right, it produces code like this:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2073"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   swap r0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2074"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   andi r0, 15</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2075"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For a two-byte (16-bit) shift, it adds the following instructions to shift</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2076"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the upper byte into the lower byte:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2077"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   swap r1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2078"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   eor r0, r1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2079"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   andi r1, 15</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2080"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   eor r0, r1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2081"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For bigger shifts, it repeats the above sequence. For example, for a 3-byte</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2082"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (24-bit) shift it adds:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2083"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   swap r2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2084"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   eor r1, r2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2085"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   andi r2, 15</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2086"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   eor r1, r2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2087"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!ArithmeticShift &amp;&amp; ShiftAmt &gt;= 4) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2088"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> Prev = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2089"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; Regs.size(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>++) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2090"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Idx = ShiftLeft ? <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : Regs.size() - <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> - 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2091"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> SwapReg = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>.createVirtualRegister(&amp;AVR::LD8RegClass);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2094"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2117"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2118"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2119"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Shift by one. This is the fallback that always works, and the shift</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2120"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// operation that is used for 1, 2, and 3 bit shifts.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2121"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ShiftLeft &amp;&amp; ShiftAmt) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2122"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Shift one to the left.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2123"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ssize&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = Regs.size() - 1; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &gt;= 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>--) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2137"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
