<Link id="l02141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2141"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Shift one to the right.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2142"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; Regs.size(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>++) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2146"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> == 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2147"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Opc = ArithmeticShift ? AVR::ASRRd : AVR::LSRRd;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2148"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a17e04afcf0c5efeb0eb6a9a45287b5e4">BuildMI</a>(&#42;BB, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, dl, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>.get(Opc), Out).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#a927857fc69e4b4f0cde307f86f180df5">addReg</a>(In, 0, InSubreg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2149"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2150"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a17e04afcf0c5efeb0eb6a9a45287b5e4">BuildMI</a>(&#42;BB, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, dl, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>.get(AVR::RORRd), Out).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#a927857fc69e4b4f0cde307f86f180df5">addReg</a>(In, 0, InSubreg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2151"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2152"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Regs&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; = std::pair(Out, 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2153"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2154"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ShiftAmt--;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2157"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ShiftAmt != 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2158"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;don&#39;t know how to shift!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">); </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sanity check</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2162"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do a wide (32-bit) shift.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2165"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   MachineBasicBlock &#42;BB)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2166"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TargetInstrInfo &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a> = &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/avrtargetlowering/#a54be6a6617929573276a5cffb1b9e355">Subtarget</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/avrsubtarget/#a68197f257d323a42ac0143c2770e086d">getInstrInfo</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2167"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dwarf-linker/#a463a58e257d5f6fb2c39eb9a2474fc24ac2e06fc138163b7095fa483616a0a47a">DebugLoc</a> &amp;dl = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getDebugLoc();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2168"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2169"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// How much to shift to the right (meaning: a negative number indicates a left</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2170"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// shift).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2171"><span class="doxyHighlight">  int64&#95;t ShiftAmt = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(4).getImm();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2172"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110">ISD::NodeType</a> Opc;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2173"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOpcode()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2174"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AVR::Lsl32:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2175"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Opc = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a8cc94e03dea594863073a02f5bb94997">ISD::SHL</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2176"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2177"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AVR::Lsr32:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2178"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Opc = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a3c6553c8acebe1b57c211ee45e2d8f98">ISD::SRL</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2179"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2180"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AVR::Asr32:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2181"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Opc = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a4a055321c361a0f6ee77ed764730ffc1">ISD::SRA</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2182"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2183"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2184"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2185"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Read the input registers, with the most significant register at index 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2186"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::array&lt;std::pair&lt;Register, int&gt;, 4&gt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/sipreallocatewwmregs-cpp/#aac69803381e5a6b3899d87676ada377f">Registers</a> = &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2187"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::pair(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(3).getReg(), AVR::sub&#95;hi),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2188"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::pair(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(3).getReg(), AVR::sub&#95;lo),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2189"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::pair(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(2).getReg(), AVR::sub&#95;hi),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2190"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::pair(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(2).getReg(), AVR::sub&#95;lo),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2191"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2192"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2193"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do the shift. The registers are modified in-place.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2194"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad64501a368789645f6f80afbce82da90">insertMultibyteShift</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, BB, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/sipreallocatewwmregs-cpp/#aac69803381e5a6b3899d87676ada377f">Registers</a>, Opc, ShiftAmt);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2195"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2196"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Combine the 8-bit registers into 16-bit register pairs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2197"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This done either from LSB to MSB or from MSB to LSB, depending on the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2198"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// shift. It&#39;s an optimization so that the register allocator will use the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2199"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// fewest movs possible (which order we use isn&#39;t a correctness issue, just an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2200"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// optimization issue).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2201"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   - lsl prefers starting from the most significant byte (2nd case).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2202"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   - lshr prefers starting from the least significant byte (1st case).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2203"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   - for ashr it depends on the number of shifted bytes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2204"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Some shift operations still don&#39;t get the most optimal mov sequences even</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2205"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with this distinction. TODO: figure out why and try to fix it (but we&#39;re</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2206"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// already equal to or faster than avr-gcc in all cases except ashr 8).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2207"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Opc != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a8cc94e03dea594863073a02f5bb94997">ISD::SHL</a> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2208"><span class="doxyHighlight">      (Opc != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a4a055321c361a0f6ee77ed764730ffc1">ISD::SRA</a> || (ShiftAmt &lt; 16 || ShiftAmt &gt;= 22))) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2209"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Use the resulting registers starting with the least significant byte.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2210"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a17e04afcf0c5efeb0eb6a9a45287b5e4">BuildMI</a>(&#42;BB, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, dl, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>.get(AVR::REG&#95;SEQUENCE), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(0).getReg())</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2279"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Lower atomicrmw operation to disable interrupts, do operation, and restore</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2281"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;AVRTargetLowering::insertAtomicArithmeticOp(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2282"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;BB, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Opcode, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Width)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2284"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TargetInstrInfo &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a> = &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/avrtargetlowering/#a54be6a6617929573276a5cffb1b9e355">Subtarget</a>.getInstrInfo();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2287"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2288"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Example instruction sequence, for an atomic 8-bit add:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2289"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ldi r25, 5</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2290"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   in r0, SREG</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2291"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   cli</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2292"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ld r24, X</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2293"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   add r25, r24</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2294"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   st X, r25</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2295"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   out SREG, r0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2296"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2297"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TargetRegisterClass &#42;RC =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2298"><span class="doxyHighlight">      (Width == 8) ? &amp;AVR::GPR8RegClass : &amp;AVR::DREGSRegClass;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2299"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LoadOpcode = (Width == 8) ? AVR::LDRdPtr : AVR::LDWRdPtr;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2300"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StoreOpcode = (Width == 8) ? AVR::STPtrRr : AVR::STWPtrRr;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2301"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2302"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Disable interrupts.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2303"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a17e04afcf0c5efeb0eb6a9a45287b5e4">BuildMI</a>(&#42;BB, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, dl, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>.get(AVR::INRdA), <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/avrtargetlowering/#a54be6a6617929573276a5cffb1b9e355">Subtarget</a>.getTmpRegister())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2304"><span class="doxyHighlight">      .<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#a6c1f959947905135c7dd215b64957654">addImm</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/avrtargetlowering/#a54be6a6617929573276a5cffb1b9e355">Subtarget</a>.getIORegSREG());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2305"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a17e04afcf0c5efeb0eb6a9a45287b5e4">BuildMI</a>(&#42;BB, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, dl, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>.get(AVR::BCLRs)).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#a6c1f959947905135c7dd215b64957654">addImm</a>(7);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2306"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2307"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Load the original value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2308"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a17e04afcf0c5efeb0eb6a9a45287b5e4">BuildMI</a>(&#42;BB, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, dl, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>.get(LoadOpcode), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(0).getReg())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2309"><span class="doxyHighlight">      .<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#a713eab58694282971c413a0d6de5975c">add</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(1));</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2391"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2392"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To &quot;insert&quot; a SELECT instruction, we insert the diamond</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2393"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// control-flow pattern. The incoming instruction knows the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2394"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// destination vreg to set, the condition code register to branch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2395"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// on, the true/false values to select between, and a branch opcode</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2760"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// e.g. 254 would be printed as -2,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2761"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// so we force it to i16 at least.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2762"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Ty.getSimpleVT() == MVT::i8) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2763"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Ty = MVT::i16;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2764"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2765"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Result = DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#abf892d1e00a3d79026c5ab518c187c45">getTargetConstant</a>(CUVal64, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, Ty);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2766"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2767"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;N&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">: </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// -1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2768"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CVal64 != -1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2769"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2770"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Result = DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#abf892d1e00a3d79026c5ab518c187c45">getTargetConstant</a>(CVal64, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, Ty);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2771"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2772"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;O&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">: </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 8, 16, 24</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2773"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CUVal64 != 8 &amp;&amp; CUVal64 != 16 &amp;&amp; CUVal64 != 24)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2774"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2776"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
